page.title: 14CUMNOCK1985-GENERAL REVIEW 2
page.content: {Agriculture}This is a farming area. There are different types of farming. The most common farms are dairy farms then beef farming and finally crop farming. {Other Industries}The other industries of the Cumnock area include factory work and coal mining. There is a Bata shoe factory, a Kingsmead carpet factory, a Falmer's clothes factory and 2 collieries - the Barony and Killoch nearby. {Housing}Housing is changing. There is a variety of types from flats to bungalows.Most houses are Local Authority owned such as the large modern estate at Barshare.There are also several blocks of Local Authority flats of 5 storeys amongst more tradi- tional type of home.In the 1980s a new large development of private housing was built at Holmhead,N.side of town.
